feed.title: Invoice Ninja Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Invoice Ninja: v5.11.18
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fixes for invoice terms display incorrectly
  • Fixes for Company Imports
  • Fixes for BCC not sending on payment failures
  • Clean up for HTML purifier
  • Static analysis clean
  • auth.net Customer import fixes
  • v5.11.18 by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10504

Full Changelog: https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/compare/v5.11.17...v5.11.18

entry.title: New release for Invoice Ninja: v5.11.19

Full Changelog: https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/compare/v5.11.18...v5.11.19
